text:
Use the e-prescription app now to record your decision to donate organs in the **digital organ donation register** â€“ safely and easily. 
 
 There are currently 9,192 people in Germany urgently waiting for an organ â€“ every decision counts and can save lives.

 You can find the organ donation register in the â€œSettingsâ€ tab in this app.

**Improved readability** 
 We've made our brand color a little darker to increase color contrast and thereby improve readability. 
 
 **Optimized features** 
 We've updated the format of the submission dates and corrected the sorting of the messages.

ğŸ“– **Read-aloud function** 
We have redesigned several pages so that they can be read aloud by TalkBack. This significantly improves usability for people with visual impairments. 
 
ğŸ“ **Extended contact options** 
We have introduced new contact options for selected insurance companies. 
 
ğŸ”§ **Optimized functions** 
We have fixed minor errors when reading the card, cleaned up the code and improved the display of messages.

**ğŸ“² Redeem prescribed DiGAs** 
You can now redeem prescriptions for digital health applications (DiGAs) directly via the e-prescription app. The prescriptions will be issued by specialists in Hamburg as part of a pilot project. You can find your activation code and the link to the DiGA right here in the e-prescription app. 
 
 **ğŸ¥ New pharmacy database** 
We have introduced a new, future-proof database for pharmacy searches.

**ğŸŒ New translation function** 
If you use the app in another language, you can now translate the pharmacy's answers directly. 
 
 **â™¿ï¸ Accessibility** 
Our accessibility statement is now available in the settings. The onboarding process has also been made more accessible. 
 
 **ğŸ“² Redeem DiGAs with insurance companies** 
Prescriptions for digital health applications (DiGAs) can now also be redeemed with other insurance companies.

**ğŸ™Œ Registration for privately insured people** 
Registration for privately insured people has been optimized. You can log in conveniently with your Health ID in just a few clicks. 
 
 **â° Medication reminders** 
You can now set reminders to take your medication. 
 
 **ğŸ›’ Improved ordering flow** 
The ordering process is now simpler and faster. 
 
 **â™¿ï¸ Accessibility** 
The access number for the health card can now also be scanned with the camera. 
 
 **ğŸ“² More information for DiGAs** 
From now on you will receive more detailed information about your DiGA prescriptions, such as the sales price or the logo.

**ğŸ“ Flexible field for delivery instructions** 
 The field for delivery instructions now automatically adjusts to the length of the text. 
 
 **ğŸ¨ More modern buttons with Material 3** 
 The buttons have been adapted to the new Material 3 design of Android and now have a more modern and rounded appearance. 
 
 **ğŸ“¤ Share Prescriptions** 
Prescriptions can now be shared with others directly from the app.
